backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles, access control, and contact form submissions including new phone fields.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old contact submissions to include default phone fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind and custom OKLCH color variable definitions for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Contact form with validation and submission of name, email, phone country code, phone number, subject, and message.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section layout with location info, email card, and embedded ContactForm.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Renders the site footer with branding and email, Twitter, and WhatsApp contact links.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Displays the hero banner with main branding, tagline, call‑to‑action buttons, and scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the full landing page with background image and stacked sections including hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Shows a grid of tour feature cards describing key offerings with icons and animated styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Displays a single review with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Renders the reviews section using curated reviews and includes a TripAdvisor CTA.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Exports a list of country calling codes for use in phone number selection.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Provides a static array of curated 5‑star review objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
Defines a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, typography defaults, and utility text-shadow classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Captures project state, including implemented features and pending requests related to adding phone number fields to a contact form.
